original_text: Before the Lord; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.
korean_text: 그가 땅을 심판하러 임하실 것임이로다 그가 의로 세계를 판단하시며 공평으로 그의 백성을 심판하시리로다

sentences.original_text: for he cometh to judge the earth:
with righteousness shall he judge the world,
